snippet.title: Myriads: Renaissance v0.7.2, Demo walkthrough
snippet.description:
Myriads: Renaissance demo walkthrough.
Myriads: Renaissance is a turn-based strategy game with cityBuilder and 4X mechanics currently being developped by Sleeping Eight Studio.


Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1737220/Myriads_Renaissance/
Website: https://myriads-renaissance-game.com/


Music by Marma Music: http://www.marmamusic.com/
